library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

# Overview

This document tracks active projects, sub-tasks, and progress notes.
Update the status column and log entries regularly to maintain momentum.

```{r summary-table}
projects <- data.frame(
  Project = c(
    "R Sampler",
    "spmR",
    "WtAgeRE",
    "ADMB pm.tpl",
    "SporC (age-error)",
    "SporC (two-area)",
    "Admin"
  ),
  Status = c(
    "In Progress",
    "In Progress",
    "To Do",
    "In Progress",
    "To Do",
    "In Progress",
    "To Do"
  ),
  Priority = c("High","High","Medium","High","Medium","High","Low"),
  Notes = c(
    "Testing underway; age-error and data pulls pending",
    "Testing underway; alt inputs, speed, F-SPR needed",
    "Age-error development not yet started",
    "Updating 2024 base run to 2025 data",
    "Specs needed before implementation",
    "Check Russian results; develop defaults",
    "Tomo form outstanding"
  )
)

kable(projects, caption = "Project Status Summary", align = c("l","c","c","l")) |>
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped","hover","condensed"), full_width = FALSE) |>
  column_spec(2,
    color = ifelse(projects$Status == "Done", "white",
             ifelse(projects$Status == "In Progress", "white", "#555")),
    background = ifelse(projects$Status == "Done", "#5a9c6f",
                 ifelse(projects$Status == "In Progress", "#d6a435", "#ddd"))
  )
```
